twoSetSkill.name: Heavenly Three 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Gain 15% to Max HP and shortens CDs of host's Ultimate and Evasion skills by 20% in battle.

threeSetSkill.name: Earthly Six 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: When there are 3 or more enemies on the battlefield, take 50% less Elemental DMG and attacks gain 60% Elemental DMG.
